be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class Camera2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.Camera2D

  • public class Camera2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera2D is the controller of the camera when the view is switched on 2D
    Author:
    schembrijulian, brochape, wmoulart
